channel.title: Help ;( add commands
channel.description:
how i add this? i want add commands ::perku
i create data/perku.txt file
and i want:
player on my server write ::perku and nevermind what text. pvz ::perku asdssasda
and in my data/perku.txt i see this text: asdssasda
What commands i need to add in my client.java?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2008, 01:23:04 PM[/size][hr]help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2008, 01:39:48 PM[/size][hr]help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2008, 02:10:34 PM[/size][hr].
